You are walking about about an hour now and now are completely exhausted. You are frustated - "The Council could have given a Map". You drink water from your bottle.
Both sides of the street have very tall walls on which several security cameras are mounted. Ocassionaly, there is a very bright light emanating from the far straight ahead. You get curious to know the cause of that light.
